task_summary: The robot must navigate around an obstacle on the table and reach the scissors using visual perception and avoidance.

task_long_description.overview: This task is set in an office environment where a robot arm must perceive, localize, and approach a pair of scissors placed on a desk. An obstacle (possibly a book or box) is situated between the robot and the scissors, requiring an avoidant trajectory. The robot must first detect the scissors, then move its end-effector above and in line with the target while compensating for the presence of the obstacle.
preconditions: Robot initialized and ready at start position
Obstacle and scissors present at known initial locations on desk
stepwise_plan: Detect the scissors using visual perception
Move to a position above the scissors, avoiding the obstacle
Align end-effector laterally with the scissors
Advance along axis (y) to reach the scissors, sidestepping the obstacle
success_criteria: End-effector positioned adjacent to or above the scissors without collision
failure_and_recovery: Failure to detect scissors: perform another detection attempt
Collision detected: halt and retreat if possible
task_long_description.termination: Task terminates when the end-effector is at the goal pose aligned with the scissors, with no collision.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

task_instruction: avoid obstacle and reach the scissors

node_specs.description: Checks if the scissors are visible to the robot's vision system.
Attempts to detect and localize the scissors using perception within the timeout.
Moves the robot's end-effector to a pose above the scissors, elevated to avoid the obstacle.
Approaches and aligns the robot end-effector with the scissors laterally, using precise tolerance.
Moves the end-effector straight along the y-axis for 10cm to reach the scissors, sidestepping the obstacle.

recovery_strategy: Retry detection if scissors not visible
assumptions: No explicit force or multi-attempt retry needed per frame evidence
Obstacle avoidance is inferred by movement above and along axis, not by explicit obstacle object
Instruction and frames consistent; no scissors grasping occurs within these frames

expected_success_criteria: Robot reaches aligned pose above/adjacent to scissors, with obstacle avoided, no collision
